# Transmute Sand to Stone (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Earth Spells|earth]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Druid Spells|Druid 5]], [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 9]], [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Components:** V, S, M/DF

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Area:** Up to two 10-ft. cubes/level (S)

**Duration:** Permanent

**Saving Throw:** See text

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Sandstorm (WotC), pg. 125

This spell transforms a mass of sand of any depth into solid stone permanently. Any creature in the sand is allowed a Reflex save to escape before the area is hardened to stone. If the creature fails its save, it is [[Entangled|entangled]] and canâ€™t move. It is not considered helpless, however, and it can break out by damaging the stone. Stone has hardness 8 and 15 hit points per inch of thickness. The creature can also make a Strength check to break free. The break DC is 20, +2 per inch of thickness of the stone.

*Transmute sand to stone* counters and dispels *[[Transmute Stone to Sand (Spell)|transmute stone to sand]].*

*Arcane Material Component:* Sand, dirt, and water.
